name: Super Snowball Sunday
description:
Snowball Sunday+

Super Snowball Sunday is a remake of the c64 classic game Snowball Sunday by Ash & Dave released in 1988 on the Commodore 64..

This remake version has up to six human players and two computer players.

Instructions

Throw snowballs at each other and have fun. That's it

Controls

Player One - Left/Right Cursors to move. Down Cursor to Duck and Collect snow. Up Cursor to throw snowball.

Player Two - A/D to move. S to Duck and Collect snow. W to throw snowball.

Player Three to Six - XBox/PS/Any Controller.

M to change/turn off music

If the player doesn't move for over a minute he is removed from the game. He can return by moving again.

Credits

Original Programming, Graphics and Idea by Ash & Dave

Music by Lou Gray and Wally (Hagar) Beben

Converted by Glen McNamee .
